Name: Water and Justice
Title: Dance of Justice
Desc: "'Existence' was Egeria's justice... and to me, justice is the 'continuation' of that existence."

Talent.Name: Water and Justice
Talent.Desc: Distributes the HP of all your undefeated characters equally, and then heals all of them for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3405}Fontaine characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
